citations.narrative:
In an outdoor enclosure, containing a single Turkey Vulture, there were multiple broken ceiling joists with exposed
irregular and sharp metal edges. Where the ceiling joists were broken, the supports beams had also lowered on one end
further exposing the occupant to the sharp metal. Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they
protect the birds from injury.
Correct by: 08/30/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n
